module.name: mailman
module.summary: Mailman is for managing electronic mail discussion and e-newsletter lists

template.name: mailman_domain_template
template.summary: The template to define a mailmain domain.

desc.p: This template creates a domain to be used for a new mailman daemon.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The type of daemon to be used eg, cgi would give mailman_cgi_

interface.name: mailman_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute mailman in the mailman domain.

interface.name: mailman_domtrans_cgi
interface.summary: Execute mailman CGI scripts in the mailman CGI domain.

interface.name: mailman_exec
interface.summary: Execute mailman in the caller domain.

interface.name: mailman_signal_cgi
interface.summary: Send generic signals to the mailman cgi domain.

interface.name: mailman_search_data
interface.summary: Allow domain to search data directories.

interface.name: mailman_read_data_files
interface.summary: Allow domain to to read mailman data files.

interface.name: mailman_manage_data_files
interface.summary: Allow domain to to create mailman data files and write the directory.

interface.name: mailman_list_data
interface.summary: List the contents of mailman data directories.

interface.name: mailman_read_data_symlinks
interface.summary: Allow read acces to mailman data symbolic links.

interface.name: mailman_manage_log
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete mailman logs.

interface.name: mailman_read_archive
interface.summary: Allow domain to read mailman archive files.

interface.name: mailman_domtrans_queue
interface.summary: Execute mailman_queue in the mailman_queue domain.
